#User Guide
  
  # Press Open button and select ontologies to compare
  [http://code.google.com/p/ontologycomparision/source/browse/trunk/screenshots/open.png]
  [http://code.google.com/p/ontologycomparision/source/browse/trunk/screenshots/select.png]
  # Select classes to show in the ontology trees in the left
  [http://code.google.com/p/ontologycomparision/source/browse/trunk/screenshots/tool.png]
  # To remove mapping between classes right-click on the node
  [http://code.google.com/p/ontologycomparision/source/browse/trunk/screenshots/remove.png]
  # To save merged ontology press Save button
  [http://code.google.com/p/ontologycomparision/source/browse/trunk/screenshots/save.png]
